entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gravenhurst
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:05 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -24.2°C

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
